text: Yuriy Yaroshenko (; born 5 January 1961, in Frunze (today Bishkek), Kyrgyz SSR) is a former Soviet and Ukrainian footballer and Ukrainian football coach. He has a son Kostyantyn Yaroshenko who plays football. == References == ==External links== * * Yaroshenko profile at footballfacts.ru Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bishkek Category:Kyrgyzstani emigrants to Ukraine Category:Piddubny Olympic College alumni Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Uzbekistan Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:FC Zaria Bălți players Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:FC Khimik Severodonetsk players Category:Navbahor Namangan players Category:FC Dynamo Luhansk players Category:FC Hirnyk Rovenky players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:PFC Sumy managers Category:FC Poltava managers Category:FC Alians Lypova Dolyna managers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players
title: Yuriy Yaroshenko
